thread.section_title: Love Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Love Systems | lovesystems.com
thread.title: Jules

author: Jules
title: Jules
text:
I had my reservations at first. After this is an online website selling pua training, it seemed kinda sketchy. But having done it I can say (without a doubt in my mind) it's not a scam, this is the real deal! These aren't salesmen, they want to see you succeed.
The trainer I had (issac) was informative and was very helpful. What he taught me made sense and lined up with stuff I already knew. He answered my questions without much hesitation, and when we where in the field stopped me from chickening and making excuses (which helped me a lot).
Other than that I had a great time learning and trying this stuff out. If your anything like me where you could never find the stones to get out there, these guys can and will help you.
